Package at.htlle

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.htlle.Article
      • at.htlle.Book
  • public class Book
extends Article
    A child of Article. It's a book object. It has several variables and their getters as well as a constructor, which is used to assign its variables and a getPrice method, which calculates its price by taking the article's price and multiplying that by the VAT.
    Author:
    Lukas

    • Constructor Detail

      • Book

        public Book​(java.lang.Integer articleNumber,
            java.lang.Float price,
            java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String author,
            java.lang.Integer year)
        Constructor for the book object. Calls the super method (constructor of the parent class) to initialise its variables.
        Parameters:
        articleNumber - The number of this article.
        price - The price of this article (without VAT).
        title - The title of the book.
        author - The author of this book.
        year - The year, the book has been published.

        public java.lang.Float getPrice()
        Overrides the getPrice method given by the parent class. It adds the VAT to the price.
